name: charge-beam
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 70% chance to raise the user’s Special Attack by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 70% chance to raise the user’s Special Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.black-white: The user attacks with an electric charge. The user may use any remaining electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user attacks with an electric charge. The user may use any remaining electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.
